text: Mehdi Mirdavoudi (Persian: مهدی میرداوودی) (born September 11, 1977) is an Iranian heavyweight kick-boxer Fighter Profile: Mehdi Mirdavoudi Mehdi Mirdavoudi Mehdi Mirdavoudi and a professional strongman, Medi Mirdawoodi competing for Iran in international competitions. He competed for Iran in K-1 World Grand Prix 2006 in Seoul.Event 2006 He also competed in several internal and international strongman competitions.رقابت‌ قويترين‌ مردان‌ جهان‌ در کيش‌برگزاری مسابقات قوی‌ترین مردان جهان در ایرانIFSA GRAND PRIX DUBAI 2006 He participated two times (1998 & 2004) in Iran's Strongest Man competition and could reach the final in both times. ==See also== *K-1 World Grand Prix 2006 in Seoul *Iran's Strongest Man ==References== ==External links== *Mehdi Mirdavoudi page * فدراسیون قویترین مردان آسیا *برگزاری مسابقات جهانی آماتور پرورش اندام Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian male kickboxers Category:Super heavyweight kickboxers Category:Iranian strength athletes Category:Iranian powerlifters Category:Heavyweight boxers
title: Mehdi Mirdavoudi
